title: Maia's Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chef uses locally grown organic produce to prepare modern Mexican vegetarian and vegan dishes. Decorated with contemporary local paintings in a pleasing atmosphere. Wi-fi access upon request. Located in the Villa Mercedes Hotel in old town section of the city.
